created_by: Florian Roth, Tom Ueltschi, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community
name: Adwind RAT / JRAT
description: Detects javaw.exe in AppData folder as used by Adwind / JRAT
query: ((process.command_line:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Oo][Rr][Aa][Cc][Ll][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\[Jj][Aa][Vv][Aa].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ .*/) OR (process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Ee][Tt][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ss]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Oracle* AND process.command_line:*\\java* AND process.command_line:*.exe\ *) OR (process.command_line:*cscript.exe* AND process.command_line:*Retrive* AND process.command_line:*.vbs\ *))`
